A 2yr postdoc in CAS, somewhat related to ITP/ATP:

I have an open 2-year postdoc position (full-time, salary grade E13 TV-L) at the University of Kaiserslautern starting January 2023. I am looking for applicants to work on the birational geometry and representation theory of symplectic singularities. Some experience with the development and implementation of algorithms is desirable. The position is connected to the DFG Sonderforschungsbereich "Symbolic Tools in Mathematics and their Application" [1] and to the development of the OSCAR computer algebra system [2].

Applications, consisting of a CV and a statement addressing research experience, are to be sent directly to thiel@mathematik.uni-kl.de.

Kind regards,
Ulrich Thiel

[1]: https://www.computeralgebra.de/sfb/
[2]: https://oscar.computeralgebra.de

--
Prof. Dr. Ulrich Thiel
Algebra, Geometry and Computer Algebra Group
Department of Mathematics
University of Kaiserslautern
67663 Kaiserslautern, Germany
